      • buildDocument

        public static Document buildDocument(java.io.InputStream in)
        Returns a JDOM document built from a possibly compressed (GZIP) input stream. The document will be empty, if there were problems processing the input.
        Parameters:
        in - an input stream
        Returns:
        a JDOM document (may be empty)

        public static java.lang.String getProperty(Element properties,
                                           java.lang.String propertyName,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Returns the content of either a child node or an attribute of the XML element.
        If the xml element or the child or the attribute is null the specified default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        properties - XML element
        propertyName - the name of the property
        defaultValue - default
        Returns:
        property or default, if undefined

      • getProperty

        public static int getProperty(Element properties,
                              java.lang.String propertyName,
                              int defaultValue)
        Returns the content of either a child node or an attribute of the XML element. If the xml element or the child or the attribute is null or a parse error occurs the specified default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        properties - XML element
        propertyName - the name of the property
        defaultValue - default
        Returns:
        property or default, if undefined

      • getStorable

        public static Storable getStorable(Element element,
                                   java.lang.String name)
        Creates a storable from the child with given name of the given element. Gets the class name form the "class" attribute of the child, converts the possibly unqualified name to a qualified one, and creates a new instance of this class, Then, the attributes of this object are read from XML.
        Returns:
        an object, null if problems

      • getStorable

        public static Storable getStorable(Element element)
        Creates a storable from the given element. Gets the class name form the "class" attribute of the element, converts the possibly unqualified name to a qualified one, and creates a new instance of this class, Then, the attributes of this object are read from XML.
        Returns:
        an object, null if problems

      • addStorable

        public static Element addStorable(Element element,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  Storable s)
        Adds an XML element representing the Storable. The attributes of the Storable are not added here.
        Parameters:
        element - the parent element
        name - the name of the child
        s - a Storable
        Returns:
        the child element
